description: G.1 - All trees and shrubs encroaching on right of front garden, trim back to wall to tidy.G.2 - Shrubs left, trim over to tidy, Prunus, reduce to previous points. Hazel, reduce to previous level.T.1 - Laurel, left of patio, remove 2 front stems, reduce remainder by a maximum of 1 metre.T.2 - Conifer, centre of left boundary, dismantle to near ground level and grind stump to 20cms below existing grade.T.3 - Laurel, left boundary, end of borer, cut to fence height.G.4 - Apple trees in same area , prune to good orchard practice.G.5 - Dead/dying Elms, remove and grind stumps.G.3 - Horse Chestnut closest to Holly, reduce 2-3 lower laterals by a maximum of 2.5 metres to clear over Holly. clip back lower branches of chestnuts growing into centre of garden.T.4 - Cedar encroaching on right boundary, clip back lower laterals on left side of crown by maximum of 1 metre.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
